akn:content.akn:p:
§ 4513. Penalties Any person who willfully performs any act prohibited, or willfully fails to perform any act required, by the provisions of this subchapter or any rule, regulation, or order thereunder, shall, upon conviction, be fined not more than $10,000 or imprisoned for not more than one year, or both. (Sept. 8, 1950, ch. 932, title I, § 103, 64 Stat. 799.)
Termination of SectionFor termination of section, see section 4564(a) of this title.
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 2073 of the former Appendix to this title prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
